publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4347 Margo MacDonald: BNP Does Not Speak for Scotland—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Government to put measures in place to ensure that Members of the European Parliament (MEPs) and any other relevant organisations outwith Scotland are made aware that the British National Party MEPs do not speak for Scotland.
S3M-4347 BNP Does Not Speak for Scotland (lodged on 9 June 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4347 Margo MacDonald: BNP Does Not Speak for Scotland—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Government to put measures in place to ensure that Members of the European Parliament (MEPs) and any other relevant organisations outwith Scotland are made aware that British National Party MEPs do not speak for Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell*
S3M-4347 BNP Does Not Speak for Scotland (lodged on 9 June 2009) Gil Paterson*
